techmeme.title: Q&A with Tim Cook on generative AI, Apple Intelligence, the OpenAI partnership, why Apple's biggest contribution will be in health, ARM, Vision Pro, and more (Steven Levy/Wired)
NXP and Taiwanese TSMC affiliate Vanguard break ground on a $7.8B plant in Singapore to make 130nm to 40nm chips and are discussing an expansion of the facility (Josh Xiao/Bloomberg)
AI's rise has made job interviews more gruelling, with an increase in tests, essays, and assignments, as recruiters struggle to find the right candidates (Elaine Moore/Financial Times)
Google launches Veo, its AI video model to generate "high-quality" 1080p resolution videos in various styles, to businesses, beating OpenAI's Sora to market (Jess Weatherbed/The Verge)
Sources: the EU plans to crack down on Asian online retailers like Temu and Shein, including a new tax on e-commerce revenue, to combat a flood of packages (Financial Times)
